channel.title: Little mistake on the Black Mesa Site.
channel.description:
There is a little mistake on the Black mesa Site!
If you go to the Media section and there you go to the Community projects the both links of "Project 13: Record Monster Sound Effects or Human Dying Screams" and "Project 14: Create your own Human or Alien gibs" are wrong.
Ill tell you how they are wrong:
The Link of [COLOR='Red']"Project 14: Create your own Human or Alien gibs" links you to [COLOR='Blue']"Project 13: Record Monster Sound Effects or Human Dying Screams" and the link of [COLOR='Blue']"Project 13: Record Monster Sound Effects or Human Dying Screams" links you to [COLOR='Red']"Project 14: Create your own Human or Alien gibs"
(Made it colored so u can understand it a bit better)
Go check it out yourself, i think not that its base on my internet connection or something!

item.title: Little mistake on the Black Mesa Site.
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
I can’t remember if it’s been addressed before or not, but the main site still says “A Half-Life 2 Modification” across the header bar, even though the mod is no longer strictly Half-Life 2. This seemed the best thread of the bunch to point it out in.

Read full topic
item.source: Little mistake on the Black Mesa Site.

item.title: Little mistake on the Black Mesa Site.
item.dc:creator: _amp_955_dam
item.description:
Yes. My ‘fan theme’ failed. notch notch

But I am still doing the ‘fan forum skin’. notch notch

Hubi:

Your lies make the world sad. Never fear the forum skin is near! my dear, from the rear, BEER BEER BEER!

You have beer in your rear?
Hope it’s not Dirty Sanchez style. :jizz:

item.source: Little mistake on the Black Mesa Site.

item.title: Little mistake on the Black Mesa Site.
item.dc:creator: cman2k
item.description:
Do you guys really use that? I always that it was kind of useless, especially since it links to the beginning of the thread. The “New posts” button at the top of the forums is much more useful…to forum regulars anyway.

I removed it on purpose, mostly because I felt it was kind of useless/broken, and also because it was kind of ugly over there. If anything I am thinking of adding a third big graphic button on the side that says “BM Forums” or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Little mistake on the Black Mesa Site.

item.title: Little mistake on the Black Mesa Site.
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
From the twitter thread:

JeffMOD:

OK, good, now we know what they’re doing.
But could you please bring back the recent forum activity sidebar?

That’s a little mistake, but I didn’t think it was worth making a new thread.

Read full topic
